title: Sculpture tree plantation along service road to be carried out with the help of social forest Department
clause_text: Sculpture tree plantation along service road to be carried out with the help of social forest Department. Plantation at the rate of 300 plants per Hectors to be carried out before commencement of work. In this strip user of tourist interest is only be permitted.
section: REGULATIONS FOR KUNE - PANGALOLI - KURWANDE PLANNING AREA OF

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
